Apache Wink 0.1 Release Notes

Overview

This is the first official release of Apache Wink project. Apache Wink is a framework that helps you to produce and consume RESTful Web Services. Apache Wink is TCK compliant implementation of the JAX-RS v1.0 specification. The project also introduces Java API for writing clients that consume HTTP-based RESTful Web Services.

Complete list of issues fixed in 0.1
